text: My position was just eliminated at the DM/SEO Agency I worked for (it was a new position they were trying out.) I'd be happy to take on overflow or just help you free up time by handling some of your tasks. I have 20+ years in marketing. Formerly, Director of Social Media. LinkedIn and resume are missing the most recent position (Content Marketing Manager), but otherwise up to date. Work samples are posted there as well. Feel free to slack me if you have questions/interest. <https://www.linkedin.com/in/angellclark/|https://www.linkedin.com/in/angellclark/>
